dcterms:description: The InspireD Reminiscence App is designed to facilitate personalized reminiscence therapy for individuals living with mild to moderate dementia, enhancing their quality of life and engagement with family carers.
dcterms:title: InspireD Reminiscence App

dcterms:creator: S. Cunningham
M. Brill
J.H. Whalley
R. Read
G. Anderson
S. Edwards
R. Picking
dcterms:description: The Memory Tracks App assesses the wellbeing of individuals living with dementia through the use of reminiscence music, providing a mixed methods approach to evaluate its impact.
dcterms:title: Memory Tracks App

dcterms:creator: F. Yuan

dcterms:description: This dataset explores robotic dialogue strategies specifically designed for individuals with dementia, utilizing a simulated experiment to analyze interaction dynamics.
dcterms:title: Robotic dialogue strategies for people with dementia

dcterms:creator: K. Dijkstra
M.S. Bourgeois
R.S. Allen
L.D. Burgio
dcterms:description: This dataset provides a discourse analysis of conversational coherence among older adults, comparing those with and without dementia.
dcterms:title: Conversational coherence in older adults

dcterms:creator: J. Small
J. Ann Perry
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on training family care partners to communicate effectively with individuals suffering from Alzheimer's disease, detailing the Traced program.
dcterms:title: Training family care partners to communicate effectively

dcterms:creator: R.T. Woods

dcterms:description: This dataset evaluates the effectiveness and cost-effectiveness of reminiscence groups for individuals with dementia and their family caregivers.
dcterms:title: Reminiscence groups for people with dementia
